bean.p:headerText: Bookmarked Courses @{(lookupResults eq null or lookupResults.size() eq 0) ? '([span id="bookmarkSidebarHeaderCount"]0[/span])' : '([span id="bookmarkSidebarHeaderCount"]'+lookupResults.size()+'[/span])'}

property.name: render
property.value: @{lookupResults ne null and lookupResults.size() gt 0 ? false : true}

bean.p:messageText: [p]You have no bookmarked courses.[/p][p]Find courses and add them to your bookmarked courses list.[/p]

bean.p:render: @{#line.courseDetailsWrapper.scheduledTerms.size() gt 0 ? false : #line.courseDetailsWrapper.lastOffered ne null ? true : false}
